sub_topic: Finding the perimeter of a rectangle.
message_1: A rectangle has a length of 8 cm and a width of 5 cm. What is the perimeter of the rectangle in cm?
message_2:
The perimeter of a rectangle is given by the formula P = 2(L + W), where L is the length and W is the width. In this case, L = 8 cm and W = 5 cm.

P = 2(8 + 5)
P = 2(13)
P = 26 cm

The perimeter of the rectangle is 26 cm.
